name: Partners Marketing Group
description:
Partners Marketing Group is an Atlanta digital marketing firm focused on measurable results for small and midsize businesses. Since 2001, we've helped nearly 200 SMBs achieve radical growth through cost-effective lead generation and brand awareness programs. We focus on Responsive Web Development, Search Engine Marketing, Digital Advertising, Social Media, and Analytics to drive results for our clients.
We’re at our best working with clients who want a trusted partner operating as an extension of their organization. We thrive in situations where thoughtful analysis and creative thinking are required to solve complex problems. Client engagements often start with a small project, then grow with subsequent challenges into close-knit partnerships. 
Over 80% of our clients stay with us longer than five years.
As one of Atlanta’s oldest marketing firms, we have been fortunate to have worked across dozens of industries, including Education, Professional Services, Healthcare, IT, Manufacturing, Construction, Government, and Non-Profit.
Our boutique agency is small by design: our project teams consist of 5-10 people, and we limit our roster to ten clients at a time, choosing companies we believe in and can grow with. 
We’re located in West Midtown, just minutes from Atlantic Station. Come say Hello!
